name: Problems while accessing DatoCMS projects and performing API calls

updates.content: We are currently investigating a problem while accessing DatoCMS projects and performing API calls to our CMA / CDA.

We are still investigating.

It seems like an issue with an upstream DNS provider ( https://status.heroku.com/incidents/2453 )

It is confirmed that there is an issue with the upstream DNS provider (Heroku).

We will update this page as soon as we have news.

Cached graphql queries should not be affected by this down.
The upstream provider is working on a fix
